titleStmt.title: The last advice of William Laud, late Arch-Bishop, to his episcopall brethren; and especially to Bishop Wren, who still remaines prisoner in the Tower. Which was found in the said Arch-Bishops studie since his death among his other writings, and now set forth to publike view.
titleStmt.author: Laud, William, 1573-1645,

notesStmt.note: Annotation on Thomason copy: "feb: 11th. 1644"; the 5 in imprint date crossed out.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
